title: Excalidraw Codebase Tour
description: Learn the monorepo structure and key components of the Excalidraw drawing application
prerequisites: Basic understanding of React and TypeScript

steps.title: Project Overview
steps.description: Welcome to Excalidraw! This is a monorepo containing both the core React component library and the full web application. You'll see the main packages, app code, and development tools.

steps.title: Core Packages
steps.description: The packages/ directory contains the core libraries. The main package is @excalidraw/excalidraw which is published to npm. Other packages provide shared utilities, math functions, and common types.

steps.title: Web Application
steps.description: The excalidraw-app/ directory contains the full-featured web application that powers excalidraw.com. It includes collaboration features, sharing, and app-specific UI components.

steps.title: Integration Examples
steps.description: The examples/ directory shows how to integrate Excalidraw into different environments. Currently includes NextJS and browser script examples.

steps.title: Development Configuration
steps.description: Key configuration files for development. The project uses Yarn workspaces for monorepo management, TypeScript throughout, and Vite for building.

steps.title: Build Scripts
steps.description: The scripts/ directory contains build automation, release management, and development utilities. These handle package building, documentation generation, and deployment.
